Articles.Content:
I got KSP on GOG two weeks ago.  I've been playing every minute of every day ever since. I played Orbiter in about 2001 and loved it and now I am loving this and it makes me want to go back and try Orbiter. 

Having lots of fun with all the mods. They are my favorute part of the game. I have 60 installed already. My favorite mod is time control because 4x speed can be a little slow in atmosphere like when parachuting down.

I'm currently wracking my brain trying to set up a satellite network on the surface of Kerbin for the remote tech mod. (my orbital satellite network was a perfect square of four sats but the .007 eccentricity of their orbit had already made them FUBAR.). 

I like watching plump helmet punk and one f jef play ksp. 

 

IRL I am a badass professional MMA fighter/tattoo artist. Haha jk I love with my parents and go to community college. 

 

Just wanted to say howdy to my new forum! And share a bit about myself.

Hello Maltman and welcome to the KSP forums!

Glad to hear how much you are enjoying the game.  We have a wide range of folks around here from all over the world and all age ranges.

Happy landings!

Hi, @Maltman, and welcome aboard! I have to say, that's a pretty sweet name.

If you played Orbiter, you might want to check out the Realism Overhaul and Real Solar System mods. They make the game into sorta real-life, but it's about halfway between Orbiter and KSP stock.

Thanks for the warm welcome.

Thanks Dman. So far this game seems endless. I want to try all of the Realism mods. but first I am playing through the career mode with just a few (63) quality of life improvement mods XD.  There is really too much to do with all the mods and stuff. I feel like I'll be playing this for the next ten years.
